description: This is a Vite configuration JavaScript file for a React frontend project named Chronose. It sets up environment variables, plugins, path resolutions, server and preview settings including port and host configurations, and watch ignore patterns.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Configures Vite with project-specific settings, including environment loading, plugins, path aliasing, server, and preview configurations.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on current mode and working directory, filtering variables starting with 'REACT_APP_'.
